publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3680 Elaine Murray: White-coated Roe Deer—That the Parliament is concerned by reports in The Sunday Times on 9 March 2009 that a rare white-coated roebuck discovered on an estate in Dumfriesshire is being auctioned by the person owning the stalking rights for the estate; understands that deer numbers need to be controlled and that stalking is a legitimate way of undertaking such control; but believes that targeting an individual animal because of its rarity is unacceptable, and further believes that this animal will make a far greater contribution to nature tourism and the local economy if it is allowed to survive rather than if it is shot by the highest bidder.

S3M-3680 White-coated Roe Deer (lodged on 11 March 2009) David Whitton*, Rhoda Grant*, Rob Gibson*, Cathy Jamieson*, Karen Gillon*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Lewis Macdonald*, George Foulkes*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patricia Ferguson*

S3M-3680 Elaine Murray: White-coated Roe Deer—That the Parliament is concerned by reports in The Sunday Times on 9 March 2009 that a rare white-coated roebuck discovered on an estate in Dumfriesshire is being auctioned by the person owning the stalking rights for the estate; understands that deer numbers need to be controlled and that stalking is a legitimate way of undertaking such control but believes that targeting an individual animal because of its rarity is unacceptable, and further believes that this animal will make a far greater contribution to nature tourism and the local economy if it is allowed to survive rather than if it is shot by the highest bidder. Supported by: David Whitton, Rhoda Grant, Rob Gibson, Cathy Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Trish Godman, Mary Mulligan, Lewis Macdonald, George Foulkes, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Patrick Harvie, Jamie Hepburn, Kenneth Gibson, Patricia Ferguson, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Ken Macintosh*, Dave Thompson*, Irene Oldfather*
S3M-3680 White-coated Roe Deer (lodged on 11 March 2009) Christine Grahame*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3680 White-coated Roe Deer (lodged on 11 March 2009) Peter Peacock*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3680 White-coated Roe Deer (lodged on 11 March 2009) David Stewart*
